statement: When ordering the result set, unless otherwise specified, move the null values last.
Don't use *, be specific with the columns to use.
Format of the date in birth date is: 'MON DD, YYYY'
The format of the text column varies. It's either 'DD MON YYYY', or 'MON YYYY', or 'YYYY'. Use regex to parse.
The airline field in the flights table is an ID and corresponds to the UID number in the airline table.
use try_to_number when text to number/float conversion had to be done
series_name column in TV_CHANNEL has details on series name of TV
percentage column in countrylanguage table represents percentage of people speaking that language
content column has details about series in tv_channel table
loser_rank has rank of losers in matches table
winner_rank_points has details on winner rank points. loser_rank_points has details on loser rank points
TOURNEY_NAME contains name of the tournament
Friend is a bridging table and may or may not contain all records of highschooler
SONG_NAME represents song name SINGER
name should be with exact comparison. Do not use LIKE , ILIKE
date_left can be used to determine course completion date
Use exact comparisons for language, continent, GovernmentForm. Do not use LIKE or ILIKE
winner_name represents winner name. loser_name represents loser name.
name of the winner is stored in winner_name
country can have many language. It is 1 to many relationship between country and countrylanguage
COUNTRY in car_makers is a foreign key of COUNTRYID in countries
makeid in car_names is the foreign key of maker in model_list
makeid in car_names is the foreign key of maker in model_list
city,DestAirport,SourceAirport,AirportCode,AirportName,Country,Abbreviation should be with exact comparison. Do not change string for comparions. Do not use LIKE , ILIKE
pettype, should be with exact comparison. Do not change string for comparison.Do not use LIKE , ILIKE
CountryName,Model,FullName, should be with exact comparison. Do not change string for comparison. Do not use LIKE , ILIKE
episode should be with exact comparison. Do not change string for comparison. Do not use LIKE , ILIKE
LANGUAGE, continent, governmentform should be with exact comparison. Do not change string for comparison. Do not use LIKE , ILIKE
